context7.description: Access up-to-date documentation for libraries and frameworks

github.description: GitHub repository operations (create/update files, PRs, issues, branches)

vercel.description: Vercel platform management (deployments, domains, DNS, projects, teams, monitoring)

axiom.description: Query application logs and traces from Axiom (authenticates via browser)

prerequisites: Vercel account with API token (for vercel server)
installation: 1. Run 'claude mcp add' for each server or use Claude Desktop MCP configuration
2. Verify all servers connected: claude mcp list

environmentVariables.GITHUB_TOKEN: Required for github server (create at https://github.com/settings/tokens)
environmentVariables.VERCEL_API_KEY: Required for vercel server (create at https://vercel.com/account/tokens)
environmentVariables.AXIOM_URL: Required for axiom server (https://api.eu.axiom.co for EU region)
